name: Fulton County Government Center Renovation
project_tagline: PEI is a very professional MEP engineering consulting group. They work efficiently and are great to collaborate with. Without expection, all the members of PEI team have been very capable, efficient, and friendly. Yes, I would absolutely recommend PEI to other firms.
project_description: For the Fulton County Government Center, Proficient provided services for the interior renovation and expansion of the 3rd floor conference and training room.
This included separating the existing conference and media room to create room for one large multi-purpose space.

name: City of Atlanta Office Building
project_description: The City of Atlanta office building is located on 160 Trinity Avenue in the middle of the Downtown Atlanta Government Center.
The structure is a 61,399 square feet with 3 stories. A VRF system was included in Proficient's design.

name: Braselton Civic Center
project_tagline: PEI is a very professional MEP engineering consulting group. They work efficiently and are great to collaborate with. Without expection, all the members of PEI team have been very capable, efficient, and friendly. Yes, I would absolutely recommend PEI to other firms.
project_description: The civil center is a new construction, pre-engineered metal building with 2 stories.
The center includes an administrative office, a multi-purpose room, a ballroom, a lobby, a kitchen, restrooms, and storage and utility rooms.

name: Neva Lomason Memorial Library
project_description: The Neva Lomason Memorial Library project involves adding 10,000 square feet to the current 18,000- square-foot building.
The space includes meeting areas, additional public computers and accessible collections.

name: West Memphis Municipal
project_description: The project scope consists of a 9,000-square-foot fire station and police substation, a 12,000-square-foot municipal courthouse, and a 7,500-square foot fire station.

name: Jefferson County Municipal
project_description: The municipal features three 1-story buildings. One One is ~12,800 SF and includes a lab, pharmacy, and exam rooms for Jefferson County Health.
The second is a 9,000-SF structure for the County Coroner’s office. The third is roughly 5,300 SF and is for the Affairs Building in the downtown historic district.

name: Cornelia Municipal Complex
project_description: The Cornelia Municipal Complex is a 36,500 square foot structure that includes a city hall, police department and fire station.

name: Jackson County Agricultural Center
project_description: Located on the intersection of County Farm Rd and Fowler Dr, Georgia, the new construction agricultural center is an approximately 43,000-square-foot, prefabricated metal building.
The facility possesses wash rooms, multi-purpose rooms, show areas, offices, storage rooms, conference rooms, restrooms, concession areas, a kitchen, and utility rooms.

name: Decatur Visitors Center
project_description: The Decatur Visitors Center project is a fit out of a 4,600-square-foot existing space for the city of Decatur. The space includes two conference areas, an office space, a storage area, and a bathroom facility

name: The Beltline Visitors Center
project_description: The Beltline Visitors Center project is a fit-out of a 4,300 square foot visitors center for the Atlanta Beltline. The space includes a new conference room, an office space, and a storage area.

name: Foothills Church Renovation
project_description: This project includes a 27,000-square-foot office/daycare renovation at Foothill's Church.
The existing space is a pre-manufactured metal building and the renovation will cover the ground floor and mezzanine above.

name: Emory University
project_description: Emory University is a top-ranked private institution.

Proficient provided services for a renovation in the Grace Crum Rollins Building, an All-Gender Restroom addition, student housing, the James B. Williams Medical Education Building and a renovation of the Pharmacology building.

name: Georgia Military College
project_description: Georgia Military College is a public institution that focuses on providing liberal arts higher education. The Fayetteville campus is GMC’s newest campus and is 25,000 square feet.

name: Georgia Tech
project_description: Georgia Tech provides technology-based higher education and is one of the top research facilities in the U.S. Proficient's projects for the university include the Montgomery Knight Aerospace building, the Swann building, the College of Computer Sciences building, the Pettit MRC building, and the Ramble Reck Garage.

name: Georgia State University
project_description: Georgia State University projects include 25 Park Place Phase 1 & 2 Renovations and A&H restrooms.

name: Eddie White Middle Academy
project_description: We provided MEP design services for a renovation of the Eddie White Middle Academy's kindergarten hall, science labs, prep rooms, administrative suite, hallway restrooms, electronic sign, intercom system, and additional rooms.

name: Clark Atlanta University President's Residence
project_description: Clark Atlanta University is a private Methodist historically black research university.

The project featured is for a new 8,861-square-foot President's Residence for the university. It's features include a sitting room, a billiards room, a recreation room, a bedroom, a media room, a wine cellar, storage spaces, and a bathroom.

name: University of Georgia
project_description: Proficient has completed multiple projects for the public University of Georgia including the Science Library building, Dawson Hall building, Agriculture and Environmental building.

name: Kennesaw State University
project_description: Proficient has completed multiple projects for Kennesaw State University.
. Our work for the public research university includes the Kennesaw Campus Bookstore, Marietta Campus Library, Campus Lab, Administrative Suite, Dance Studio and UTIS Offices.

name: University of Florida
project_description: Proficient provided services for the top-ranked public research university's Harrell Medical Education Building.

name: Alabama A&M University
project_description: AAMU is a public research university that reflects upon its heritage as a historical black college and land-grant institution.
Proficient has provided services for a 2-story and ~ 23,000-square-foot conversion of the historic Alabama A&M Frank Lewis Gym into facilities for the Reserve Officer Training Corps Program.

name: Alta Buckhead Place
project_description: Alta Buckhead Place is a new multi-family housing development with 5 levels of 286 residential units above a 3-level open parking garage with 528 spaces. A pool courtyard, leasing/amenity spaces, and a clubhouse are also included.

name: Porter Square
project_description: Porter Square consists of 2 buildings that are about 350,000 square feet with approximately 283 multi-family units and 17,000 square feet of retail space.

name: The Maverick Flats
project_description: The project entails a 110-unit townhome development, featuring three-story units with living spaces, kitchen/dining areas, laundry facilities, and 1-2 car garages. Residences range from 1,280 to 1,690 square feet, divided into two phases.

name: Crogman School Lofts
project_description: The scope of this project includes the MEP design for converting an auditorium and stage in an old school building into one and two-story residential units

name: The Union at Auburn
project_description: The Union project involves the design of a new construction, 5-story student housing building.
The structure includes a parking deck, apartment units, and a 3,791-square-foot clubhouse. The unit types include a mix of 2, 3 and 4-bedroom units.

name: Parc at Murfreesboro
project_description: The 359-unit, multi-family community is composed of 3-story buildings with pen breezeways and balconies.

Along with a 9,500-SF clubhouse, the development includes a pool, lounge seating, cabanas, a hammock oasis, and an outdoor kitchen. Other amenities include fitness/yoga rooms, a pet spa, and a bark park.

name: Volar Barracks
project_description: The project focuses on repairing Buildings 514, 515, 516, and 517.
The 3-story barracks each need repairs for excessive moisture conditions and failing mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems.

name: Milton Townhomes
project_description: The scope of the project involves a 110-unit townhome development.
All units will be three stories and include spaces for living, kitchen/dining, laundry, and a 1-2 car garage.
The residences will range from 1,280 to 1,690 square feet. The overall design will be divided into two phases.

name: Westside Future Funds (WFF) Properties
project_description: With the mission to redevelop Atlanta's Historic Westiside, WFF grouped contracts for the design and renovation of 3 vacant multi-family properties.
The locations are 613 Echo Street with 7 units and 4,650 GSF, 588 Paines Avenue with 6 units and 4,000 GSF, and 592 Paines Avenue with 6 units and 4,500 GSF.

name: The Chelsea Westside
project_description: The Chelsea Westside is an urban contemporary community with 92 luxury townhomes ranging from 1,616 to 2,888 square feet. There are 9 different floors.

name: SK Battery America
project_description: Located on 283 acres within the Commerce industrial complex, SK Innovation's first U.S. EV battery factory spans 2.4 million square feet and costs $1.67 billion.

Phase I began in 2019, followed by Phase II in 2020, covering sitework, concrete, steel, IMP, roofing, MEP, clean/dry rooms, and ancillary support structures, including medium voltage banks and cross-country piping tracks.

name: Main Gate Logistics
project_description: Located at 1 Prosperity Drive, the Main Gate Logistics project involves a fit-out of an existing 125,000- square-foot shell building to a warehouse and distribution facility with heat, ventilation, lighting and battery charging stations.
A full fit-out of three remote offices within the space is also included.

name: Daeyoung Electronics Manufacturing Facility
project_description: Based in South Korea, Daeyoung Electronics Co. Ltd manufactures semiconductors, semiconductor parts, and other electronic parts.
We designed the mechanical, plumbing, and electrical engineering for their new, approximately 40,000-square-foot manufacturing facility in Newberry, SC.
The design is complete, and currently, we are working on the construction administration phase of the project.

name: Rockdale Technology Center
project_description: The Rockdale Technology Center involves the design of a 150,000-SF warehouse building and a 3,000-SF office space.
Plumbing will be on one side the length of the building for sanitary and water. The electrical service is designed for 2,000-amp service at each end with conduits to double in future.
Freeze protection with gas fired space heaters are also included to maintain 45 to 50 degrees.

name: Hyundai Transys Plant Extension
project_description: Including factory, office, and facility areas, the plant totals 569,603 square feet. The scope of work includes a new construction site of the Transys Georgia Transmission Shop for a siphonic storm drainage system.

name: LG Electronics Washing Machine Facility
project_description: The LG Electronics’ 1 million square-foot facility is their first washing machine plant built in the United States. Located on a 310-acre site, the facility offers a wide range of opportunities for product production.

name: Hanger
project_description: Hanger is a lead provider of orthotic and prosthetic services and products. The project consists of the group's relocation to a 144,554-square-foot building
This includes approximately 25,000 SF of office space, approximately 15,000 SF of manufacturing space, 4,440 SF for returns and a hazmat room, and the remainder will be warehouse space.

name: O2 Energy
project_description: 02 Energy is a 3.5-megawatt solar farm set on a 51- acre site.

name: Prime Subaru
project_description: Prime Subaru is a 32,000-square-foot car dealership that includes a showroom, customer lounge, office, conference space, and service shop all laid out over two floors.

name: Shottenkirk Toyota Dealership
project_description: The new dealership is approximately 48,000 square feet with a lot space for a 500+ car inventory. Car wash, quick lube, sales, and service facilities are included.

name: Sutherlin Nissan
project_description: Sutherlin Nissan is a 45,000-square-foot car dealership with showrooms, multiple garages (conditioned and just heated), offices, a training room, a car wash, a warehouse, and support areas.

name: Fulton County Airport Hangar
project_description: Proficient designed the MEP systems of a one-story aviation hangar with offices for the Fulton County Airport. The project totals approximately 14,774 square feet.

name: Sky Harbour BNA
project_description: The project consists of nine 12,000-square-foot hangars, each with 1,600 square feet of office space, for the Nashville International Airport (BNA).
All the office areas include a lounge, a galley kitchen, a laundry room, and restrooms. A 2,100-square-foot service support building is also included.

name: Mammal Gallery at the Met
project_description: The project involves the repurposing of a water tower that once served as a fire-suppression system for the 105-year-old mammoth warehouse complex. The tower will be a 2-story bar and the the adjacent 6,100- SF warehouse will feature a 300-person performance venue.

name: The Rock Fitness Center
project_description: The Rock Fitness Center is a roughly 17,000-SF gym. Proficient worked on a renovation of the building's admin areas into more fitness spaces such as racquetball courts, saunas, and group activity rooms.
The indoor pool was also fully conditioned with a dehumidification unit.

name: Ritz-Carlton Lake Oconee Pool Facility
project_description: The facility will consist of two levels and serve as a building and bath house for families. The building totals 3,570 square feet and will include restrooms/washrooms, a game room, storage areas, and an office.

name: Adventure Air Sports
project_description: Adventure Air Sports required a full tenant fitup for a 38,000 square foot facility in the basement of an existing building.
The facility offers trampolines, adventure courses, a zip line, and foam pits.

name: Atlanta Music Project
project_description: Atlanta Music Project provides music education for youths and offers rentable space to the public for conferences, luncheons, watch parties, concerts, and banquets The venue has full/audio/visual capability, flexible staging, 200 seats, a grand piano, and conference and baquet tables.

name: Grace Midtown
project_description: The Grace Midtown project consisted of two separate designs.
The first section involved the “kidtown” area, and the second consisted of a new auditorium.
The work for “kidtown” includes a standalone building with 8 different classrooms and 2 sets of bathrooms. The auditorium contains a sanctuary, performance theater, and a café bar.

name: Three Ring Studios
project_description: Three Rings Studios is a 40,000-square-foot building consisting of two 50’-0” high sound stages and back of house areas.
Sound stage areas were designed with acoustics and production flexibility in mind.

name: WellStar Medical Center
project_description: Several WellStar medical offices have been designed by Proficient across the United States.
The projects range from approximately 3,000 square feet to 8,000 square feet of office space renovations.

name: PT Solutions
project_description: A typical PT Solutions project is 3,000 square feet. The facilities include a physical therapy room with machines and other rehab equipment, office and support areas.

name: Emory Cardiology Clinic & Imaging Renovation
project_description: Emory at Peachtree City has board-certified cardiologists that offer services including general cardiology, interventional cardiology, echocardiography, nuclear cardiology, and electrophysiology.
The clinic is made up of exam rooms, offices, labs, ultrasound rooms, PT rooms, and a conference area.

name: Greater Knoxville Ear, Nose & Throat
project_description: The medical office is currently in permitting. The space is approximately 13,000 square feet with rooms for exams, procedures, audiology tests, physical therapy, hearing aid repairs, and C.T. scans.
There are also bathrooms, offices, storage areas, waiting areas, and a patio.

name: Peachstate Advanced Cardiac & Endovascular Clinic
project_description: Located at the Summit Healthplex, Peachstate Advanced Cardiac and Endovascular (PACE) is a Center for Heart and Amputation Prevention (CHAMP) that works to create public awareness on cardiovascular disease.
Our scope of work invloved a 5,600-square-foot build-out for the 1st generation medical office.

name: Advanced Urology
project_description: The Advanced Urology project is 30,000 square feet with two Class C operating rooms, six procedure rooms, twenty exam rooms, offices, and support areas.

name: Oakhurst Medical Center
project_description: The Oakhurst Medical Center is a 12,911 square foot single story building.
The building includes common areas, administrative offices, an outpatient clinic, pediatrics, OBGYN, dental, imaging, laboratory, optometry and ophthalmology spaces.

name: Eye Surgery and Laser Center
project_description: This Eye Surgery and Laser Center is 12,000 square feet with two Class C operating rooms, 18 exam rooms, offices and support areas.

name: Outpatient Imaging
project_description: OutPatient Imaging is a 10,000 square feet medical project.
The project includes a bone density scan room, CT scans, digital fluoroscopy, digital mammography, magnetic resonance imaging, open magnetic resonance, nuclear medicine, an ultrasound, and X-ray.

name: Atlanta Vascular and Vein Center
project_description: The Atlanta Vascular and Vein Center is 3,500 square feet with one Class B operating room, four exam rooms, offices and support areas.

name: HealthPlex Performance Center
project_description: This facility has 100,000 square feet of interior space. About 60,000 square feet is designed as a medical health club with multiple interior pools, a fitness center, a physical therapy area, a track and an indoor field house.
The remaining space includes a medical office, eye surgery center, exam rooms, and a spa.

name: Heartland Dental
project_description: A typical Heartland Dental Center (HDC) project is 5,000 to 8,000 square feet. The facilities include 10 to 15 procedure rooms, offices and support areas.

name: Apotheca, Inc.
project_description: Apotheca offers homeopathic, nutritional supplement and botanical manufacturing of natural healthcare products. Proficient provided services for a new addition and renovations to the company's building.
The production facility has an in-house lab equipped with high-tech analytical equipment and staffed by Ph.D. specialists.

name: Innovation Compounding
project_description: Innovation Compounding is a compounding pharmacy with over 7,000 prescribers and 70,000+ patients. Proficient provided services for the gutting and re-building of a 12,000-square-foot building for the facility.

name: Gynecology Associates of Gwinnett
project_description: Gynecology Associates of Gwinnett provides preventative, diagnostic, and advanced gynecological services for women.
The health center includes a waiting room, exam rooms, offices, bathrooms, and storage spaces.

name: Atlanta Bone and Joint Specialists
project_description: The Atlanta Bone and Joint Specialists project involves the renovation of an existing dental suite to an imaging suite.
The scope of work includes a complete demolition of the area and a build back for one MRI and future imaging room.

name: Primary Care & Endocrinology
project_description: Located in the Forsyth Physicians Center, the tenant buildout is for a medical office that contains rooms for examinations, procedures, x-rays, storage, reception, and waiting.

name: Belmont Physicians Center
project_description: Belmont Physicians Center is a 33,000 square foot Class A medical office building located in Smyrna, GA. The facility is anchored by Emory Healthcare.

name: AlignLife of Centrum
project_description: Located in an existing shopping center, the project involved the interior renovation of a 1-story chiropractic and natural health center.
The scope featured removing finishes and interior walls, the erection of several walls, and adding new finishes throughout.

name: PNC Bank
project_description: Located at 1075 Peachtree Street, the PNC Bank project involved a fit out of a 27,000-square-foot office tower floor from an empty shell condition.
The fit-out included the MEP design of individual offices, open office space, conference rooms, a café, a storage room, a reception area, and an elevator lobby. The project is LEED silver certified.

name: Lee + White Redevelopment
project_description: The Lee + White Development building dates back to the 1950's. The project features an adaptive reuse of an approximately 99,000-square-foot, double height yet single story building into a creative office space.
Additional food hall space (25000sq) with inclusion of a bar area and patio.

name: Complex
project_description: Complex, a redevelopment involving six attached post-WWII warehouse buildings in West Midtown into loft office and retail spaces, totals approximately 105,000 square feet.
The adaptive reuse project is one of many that offers office tenants a location different from a glass tower.

name: Two Buckhead Plaza
project_description: Two Buckhead Plaza, a 200,000 square foot, Class A Office Building in the Buckhead District of Atlanta, is part of a mixed-use urban development.
This also includes high-rise residential, retail and parking functions.

name: The Willoughby
project_description: The Willoughby is the Beltline's first ground-up office building.
It will be a four-story, 43,000-square-foot complex snuggled up next to the Historic Fourth Ward Skate park.

name: The Circa 730
project_description: The Circa 730 project is a roughly 30,000-square-foot renovation of a office building located on 730 Peachtree Street that was built in 1967. This includes the lobby area and 3rd floor

name: 550 Pharr Road
project_description: Three, an up-and-coming advertisement firm, relocated their corporate office to the top two floors of the 550 Pharr Building in Buckhead.
The project renovation includes 11,000 square feet of office space with upgrades to all of the outdated MEP systems within the 47-year-old building.

name: Gateway Center Two
project_description: Gateway Center Two is a 51,000-square-foot, Class A office building located on the South Side of Atlanta.
The building is three floors with a 3,000-sqaure-foot lobby and 2 24,000-sqaure-foot floors above.

name: McKesson
project_description: We have completed multiple projects for McKesson office buildings in metro Atlanta.
This includes a security monitoring remodel and 19,000-square-foot fit-up of the North Druid Hills building's 4th floor.
Proficient has also performed upgrades on 4 stories of the Windward, GA office building.

name: SAIC Office Renovation
project_description: Located on the Regions Bank Building's first floor, we provided the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering design for a Tennessee Tech Foundation 7,700-sqaure-foot office renovation.
The new layout includes an open office, work spaces, conference rooms, a break room, and restrooms. The existing vault was also removed.

name: Hitachi Zosen Tenant Improvement
project_description: Located in Cedar Bluff, the approximately 7,600- square-foot renovation took place on first floor only.
The scope included updating the common restrooms, meeting room, offices, lobby, breakfast and food prep areas, and fitness room.

name: Baird Office
project_description: The approximately 4,600-SF office tenant fit-out required a new VAV and PIU design to meet the space's needs. The scope also included fire protection design intent.

name: Keller Williams
project_description: Keller Williams required the MEP design for a roughly 12,000-square-foot real estate office. The building features reception areas, training classrooms, breakrooms, and roughly 40 private offices.

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Renovation
project_description: The existing Holiday Inn Express & Suites building consists of 3 stories, 63 guest rooms, and an enclosed swimming pool.
The renovation includes new finished, new casework, exterior and interior repair work, and 2 new meeting rooms that will replace 2 existing guest rooms.

name: Hampton Inn Renovation
project_description: Located in Cedar Bluff, the project involves an approximately 7,600-square-foot hotel renovation.
The scope of the work includes first floor spaces such as common restrooms, a meeting room, offices, a lobby, a breakfast area, a food prep area, and fitness room.

name: Best Western Premier
project_description: Best Western Premier a 124-key, seven story hotel.
The scope includes coordinating utility connections with the indoor pool designer, the MEP design for a rooftop restaurant and patio seating, site lighting, and photometric design.

name: TownePlace Suites by Marriott
project_description: The TownePlace Suites project involves modifying the hotel's Gen 4 prototype to Gen 5 interior updates.
The 85-key hotel features a porte-cochère and an interior swimming pool. The structure had metal stud bearing walls with hollow core concrete plank floors and metal roof trusses.

name: Inn at Patrick Square
project_description: The Inn at Patrick Square is a boutique hotel that will feature 45 guest rooms, a ballroom with capacity of up to 150 and the Stumphouse Café.
It offers an authentic, traditional setting overlooking the beautiful Village Green..

name: Avid Hotel
project_description: The Avid Hotel project involves the development of a new, 41,695-square-foot hotel with 4 levels and 87 rooms.

name: Staybridge Suites by IHG
project_description: Staybridge Suites is going to be in Duluth, GA. This project is a new, ground up, 5-story, 115-room hotel.

name: Hyatt Place
project_description: Hyatt Augusta is a 70,000-square-foot, 4-story hotel.
The facility was built to provide added hospitality options in Augusta and specifically for the Masters
The facility includes a guest dining room and bar with a full commercial kitchen, a business center, multiple meeting rooms, and commercial and guest laundry areas.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton
project_description: This Home2 Suites located in Gulf Breeze, Florida is 56,651 gross square feet.
The ground floor amenity and service spaces are approximately 11,630 square feet. There are 107 guest suites comprised of 2-4-unit types. Extended stay suites will include a kitchenette.

name: Sobu Flats Conversion
project_description: Proficient Engineering provided the mechanical and plumbing engineering for the conversion of the Sobu Flats building in Revit.
The early 1950's building will feature a 135,000-sqaure-foot, boutique hotel with 9 stories and a variable refrigerant flow (VRF) for the HVAC.

name: Fairfield Inn by Marriott
project_description: The scope of the project includes the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering of a wood frame hotel that totals 56,809 square feet with 4 stories and 92 rooms.

name: Best Western Plus Renovation
project_description: The Best Western Plus renovation included the mechanical and electrical engineering design for approximately 4,900 square feet of the hotel's ground floor.

The new equipment design featured a split system for the lobby, a split system for a meeting room and bathrooms, and (5) mini-split ceiling cassettes for the fitness room, the prep kitchen, and corridors.

name: Sweetwater Brewing Company
project_description: The SweetWater Brewery project is located at 195 Ottley Drive in Atlanta, Georgia.  Partnering with Studio Chib, our goal of the project was to create indoor and outdoor spaces for dining, lounging, shopping at the bar shop, enjoying an outdoor musical experience, and relaxing with a beer.

The focus of the indoor space was a central beer bar with an open kitchen surrounded by friendship-style dining tables that offer views of the brewery’s beer making process. The outdoor space is directly connected through openable glass garage doors  and has an elevated patio that is covered by a canopy and wood trellis, allowing the customers to view the musical event stage set amidst a sprawling green landscaped lawn.

The biggest challenge of this project was managing the tight project schedule and keeping the project within the budget while meeting the client's expectations. Concealed existing conditions discovered during construction as well as the dining area's open design posed some additional challenges.

Our work provided reliable air conditioning for the brewery's restaurant and bar area that opens to the outside during the spring and early summer season. An air curtain design kept smoke created by the open kitchen from seeping into the dining area as well. Our overall work with the project resulted  in multiple interconnecting spaces that served the establishment's multifunctional and casual environment in a cost-effective manner.

name: C Ellet's
project_description: C. Ellet’s is a next-generation steakhouse located at The Battery at SunTrust Park.
The space includes a kitchen, associated storage spaces, a bar, oyster bar with walk up service window, multiple points of sale and dining spaces, and restrooms required for the fitout.

name: Dreamland BBQ
project_description: Dreamland is known for their bar-b-que ribs and southern atmosphere.
The décor inside is warm and inviting with a big bar, a few tables and booths and a pot bellied stove. Duluth Georgia is home to this 6,500 square foot BBQ restaurant.

name: Bar Mercado
project_description: For Bar Mercado, bright colors and bold patterns are layered over an existing backdrop of old brick, steel, and concrete to evoke the excitement of a Spanish market.
Alongside our restauranteur clients, we took inspiration from the Mercado de San Miguel, a food hall within an open ironwork structure dating from 1916 located in Madrid.

name: Gusto at The Avalon
project_description: Gusto is known for their unique menu and innovative attitude.
This restaurant makes a great addition to the Aavalon, a popular hangout spot outside of Atlanta.

name: Kale Me Crazy
project_description: Kale Me Crazy is a super food café that that focuses on feeding a healthy lifestyle. Proficient has designed several of these establishments across the Southeast.

name: H&W Steakhouse
project_description: H&W Steakhouse is a brand of parent company Norsan Restaurants. This concept will breathe new life into the traditional steakhouse and plans to carry the finest prime grade, black angus and corn fed steaks.
The scope of the project includes a 6,600- square-foot building with covered patio. The dining room and bar was gutted and the kitchen was reworked.

name: Wild Wing Cafe
project_description: An existing Ruby Tuesday is being converted into a Wild Wing Café in Dawsonville, GA.

The project scope includes a new covered patio to front of building, an expanded bar area, a new kitchen equipment layout, a potential new raised stage in dining room, and a potential addition of a new cooler to back of building.

name: Zalate Taqueria
project_description: The project featured the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering design for a 3,800-square-foot restaurant renovation of an existing retail space with a bar.

name: Bud's Farmhouse Coffee
project_description: For Bud's Farmhouse Coffee, we provided the mechanical, electrical, and plumbing engineering design for an approximately 1,500-square-foot coffee shop p fit-up of a previously occupied generic retail space.
The mechanical scope included reusing existing RTU with the revised diffuser layout. One new restroom was also added and the existing restroom was modified as necessary to meet code.

name: Common Place Coffee
project_description: The project involved an approximately 2,700-squarefoot coffee shop tenant fit-up. The HVAC scope included re-using the existing system if possible. New exhaust fan(s) were included for the revised bathroom layout.

. The plumbing scope covered the modification of the bathroom layout and the addition of a coffee bar with a dishwasher and under-counter grease trap. Lighting updates and power design was also included as needed.

name: Taco Bell
project_description: Proficient is consistently helping Taco Bell expand and has worked on several of their locations across the Southeast.

name: Zaxby's
project_description: Proficient developed the new prototype design for Zaxby's.
This prototype has saved thousands of dollars on each store while providing more comfortable space conditions using less energy.

name: Second Self
project_description: Second Self Brewery is located on the West side of Atlanta. The building is 4,000 square feet and includes a tasting room with a game area, storage space and beer making room.

name: Reformation Brewery
project_description: Proficient provided services for the relocation of Reformation Brewery into an existing 7,000-squarefoot building.

name: Wild Heaven Beer
project_description: Wild Heaven Beer is located on the Beltline in the Lee + White Development. The brewery is 20,700 square feet including cold storage, dry storage, event space, and office space.

name: Elsewhere Brewing
project_description: Elsewhere sells a diverse line-up of American and European brews and offers Argentine inspired sandwiches & empanadas, along with other seasonal plates.

Elsewhere’s taproom design takes inspiration from beer gardens in Bavaria, pubs in Yorkshire, cafes in Brussels, drinking halls in Prague, and mezcalerias in Oaxac, forming a unique and homey atmosphere

name: Sabbath Brewing
project_description: Located on Flat Shoals Avenue, Sabbath Brewing focuses on brewing high quality ales fermented in oak such as Saisons and Grisettes.
The venue also hosts live music and game nights. We provided the plumbing design for the new establishment.

name: Pontoon Brewing
project_description: Pontoon Brewing is opening a new location at an existing warehouse in Tucker, GA. The building includes 3,000-sqaure-foot of office area that will be converted into a tasting room and small kitchen.
The restrooms need to be upgraded and the HVAC design needs to be re-worked. The rest of the space will become Pontoon's new primary production brewery.

name: Georgia Furniture Mart
project_description: This project includes providing electrical and plumbing for the renovation and tenant fit-up of an existing 38,680 square foot retail space. It also includes the renovation of two restrooms, a break room, and new lighting throughout the facility.

name: Lendmark
project_description: Proficient has provided services for Lendmark at multiple locations including in CA, AZ, AL, TX, TN, GA, SC, NC, WA, and OH.

For these projects, Mep design is completed for an approximately 1200-1500-squarefoot office space. Services are relatively similar for all projects and are completed on an effective and flexible schedule.

name: Two Bikes
project_description: The Two Bikes project is a 3,800-square-foot renovation of an existing space into a bicycle shop located in the historic Old City. The scope of work includes retail, bike storage & display, and a bike workshop space on the ground level.
At the upper level, there is an additional bulk bike storage & a small office space.

name: HBO Storage
project_description: For this project, Proficient provided design for all new MEP systems included in the repair and renovation of an existing self storage building.
The facility consists of one 63,157-square-foot level and a 36,000-squarefoot mezzanine.

name: Westside Village at Moores Mill
project_description: The $25 million project is a mix of shops and restaurants.
It sits on nearly 10 acres along Marietta Boulevard. The development repurposes two existing buildings, a large warehouse and former church, and adds as much as 50,000 SF of new construction.

name: Saks Fifth Avenue
project_description: With 27,000 square feet at Buckhead Station, Saks Fifth Avenue includes a sales floor with office package, warehouse and support areas.

name: Indian Lake
project_description: The Indian Lake Retail project is a total of 29,360 square feet of leasable area for the developer. The initial design provides warm dark shells for multiple tenants with full fit-ups of a Tuesday Morning restaurant and a UFC Gym.

name: Pure Luxe Renovation
project_description: The project is currently in permitting. It features a 2,000-SF renovation to a 4,100-SF suite. The space will be joined to a neighboring suite, but the utilities will remain separate.

Additional renovations/ additions include new decorative lighting and new data/power for the reception desk, 6 new laser/injectable med rooms, and converting the existing sauna/gym to a staff workroom.

name: Fairview Road Self Storage
project_description: The Fairview Road Self Storage project involved the MEP system design of a 3-story prototype for a storage facility that can be easily adaptable to several other locations

name: North Macon Plaza
project_description: The Plaza project consists of 3 buildings and parking lots. The buildings have varying levels of fit-outs including cold dark shells, turnkey spaces, modified white boxes, and warm dark shells.
Building 100 features a Michaels, Ross, Marshalls/HomeGoods, and Five Below. Some of Building 200's tenants are Lifeway Christian Stores, Famous Footwear, Old Navy, and Bealls.

name: Roosevelt Square
project_description: Roosevelt Square is a shopping and restaurant center located in West Jacksonville. We provided the MEP design of four warm dark shell buildings for future retail and restaurant use.
This included stubbing in utilities for all suites and setting grease traps for the planned restaurant spaces.

name: Bradley Square Mall Renovation
project_description: The mall renovation includes the demolition of an existing department store and replacement with 3 new tenant suites.

An addition of a new free-standing building with inline tenants and a new mall entry is also included. Some of the tenant spaces will include grease interceptors for potential future use as restaurants.

name: The Beacon
project_description: Containing 80,000 square feet, The Beacon is a unique retail, dining and cultural destination nestled along the Beltline in Atlanta’s charming Grant Park Neighborhood.

name: The Malone
project_description: The Malone is the development of a 55+ living community. The facility is approximately 440,000 square feet and includes retail space, a leasing office, and amenities including demonstration cooking.

name: Watercrest Senior Living
project_description: Watecrest Macon is a 107-unit senior living community with 75 assisted living and 32 memory care dwellings. The overall structure is 93,249 square feet includes several different amenity and service spaces.

name: Vinings Senior Village
client_name: Vinings Senior Village is a new construction project that will consist of a 56,279-sqaure-foot, 4-story building. It is planned to have 48 units.

name: Aiken Mall Redevelopment
project_description: For Phase 1 of the Aiken mall redevelopment, there will be an addition of 256 luxury apartments. Future plans include an upscale hotel as well as retail and dining establishments.

name: Cinepolis Movie Theater
project_description: The 33,000-square-foot movie theater, with a new full-service kitchen addition, underwent complete gutting and renovation.

name: The Academy Lofts
project_description: The old George Adair School, constructed in 1912, will be transformed into The Academy Lofts.

The development works on revitalizing the Adair Park neighborhood by providing 35 affordable micro-units targeting creatives and artists and 2,500 square feet of loft-office space to serve nonprofits and small businesses.

name: Quarter Westside
project_description: The planned mixed use will featuremore than300 residential units, including a 273-unit apartment complex, and a collection of townhouses, flats and city homes. It includes 3 different buildings, 2 that are 4 stories and 1 that is 5 stories.

name: The Local
project_description: The Local is an urban infill, mixed-use project that includes 282 residential units and 8,000 SF of street level retail that wrap around a 5-level parking deck. Portions of two historic warehouses were also preserved in a separate, 5-story adaptive reuse building, housing 23 units and 5,000 SF of amenity space.

name: KWA Office HQ
project_description: With a total of 4,800 square feet split evenly over two stories, Kronberg Wall’s studio is located in what was the historic church’s sanctuary with a separate tenant space below
